title: Muting Champion Emotes/Quotes
body: I muted a Jinx in a game I just played but I could still hear all of her champion's emotes (i.e. when she would score a kill, destroy a turret, respawn, go on a killing spree. etc.). The person playing Jinx wasn't toxic but Star Guardian Jinx is such a damn annoying skin. I thought you could mute a champion's laugh/joke/taunt(s) by muting the player but does this not mute their other emotes?

replies.body:
Ahhhhh yea I can understand where you're coming from, except for me it's Star Guardian Lux XD!

Moving along, you can actually 'mute' those emotes and such by going into your in-game options and turning down/turning off **Voice Volume**.

Hi Broporo. Just out of curiosity, would lowering the Voice Volume lower it for all champions?
It will indeed lower it for all champions. I know it's not the best solution, but as far as I know, that will be the only way to not hear her tilting voice anymore lol.
